background: Al Jazeera Balkans commissions documentaries across the former Yugoslavia region. Focus on investigative, social justice and cultural identity films with Balkan and global resonance.
thematic_priorities: Human rights and justice in the Balkans
content_not_wanted: Projects not rooted in Balkan realities
target_audience: International Al Jazeera English/Arabic co-production viewers
technical_requirements: BCS or English delivery with subtitles
current_calls: Stories with cross-border and global relevance
submission_process: Pitch deck in BCS or English with story arc
name: Al Jazeera Balkans
